metadata.title: CVE-2023-52586 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/msm/dpu: Add mutex lock in control vblank irq Add a mutex lock tocontrol vblank irq to synchronize vblank enable/disable operationshappening from different threads to prevent race conditions whileregistering/unregistering the vblank irq callback. v4: -Removedvblank_ctl_lock from dpu_encoder_virt, so it is only a parameter ofdpu_encoder_phys. -Switch from atomic refcnt to a simple int counter asmutex has now been added v3: Mistakenly did not change wording in lastversion. It is done now. v2: Slightly changed wording of commit messagePatchwork: https://patchwork.freedesktop.org/patch/571854/

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
